了.definition: to finish; (used with 得[de2] or 不[bu4] after a verb to express (im)possibility, as in 忘不了[wang4bu5liao3] "cannot forget"); (literary) (usually followed by a negative such as 無|无[wu2] or 不[bu4]) completely (not); entirely (not); (not) in the least; to understand clearly (variant of 瞭|了[liao3])

了了.definition: to realize clearly; to settle a matter; to get it over with

了事.definition: to dispose of a matter; to be done with it

了卻此生.definition: to live out one's life; to die

了去了.definition: (coll.) (after adjectives such as 多[duo1], 大[da4], 遠|远[yuan3], 高[gao1]) very; extremely

了如指掌.definition: to know sth like the back of one's hand (idiom); to know (a person, a place etc) inside out

了斷.definition: to bring to a conclusion; to settle (a dispute); to do away with (oneself); to break off (a relationship); resolution (of a problem)

了此殘生.definition: to live out the rest of one's life

了無.definition: to completely lack; to have not even the slightest

了無生趣.definition: to lose all interest in life (idiom)

了然於胸.definition: (idiom) to be well aware; to understand clearly

了當.definition: frank; outspoken; ready; settled; in order; (old) to deal with; to handle

了知.definition: (Buddhism) to fully understand; to understand completely

了結.definition: to settle; to finish; to conclude; to wind up

了若指掌.definition: see 了如指掌[liao3 ru2 zhi3 zhang3]

了解.definition: to understand; to realize; to find out
